message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. Would you like to make an offer on it?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in purchasing the product, but I can only pay $95.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can do a bit better than that. Would you be willing to meet me at $105?
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I would like to counter with $100 for the product.
